Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hotel”
Reviews.Author: Aussieileen
Reviews.Content: spent 3 nights hotel highly recommend travellers venice hotel located st marcos square rialto bridge comfortable beautifully decorated venetian style buffet breakfast included price includes wide range fresh fruits cereals breads hams cheese etc freshly coffee price includes free wifi staff incredible friendly enjoy stay venice fantastic value expensive city

Reviews.Title: “Excellent rooms”
Reviews.Author: Karoly75
Reviews.Content: san luca located near san marco rialto neither noisy nor crowded narrow street buffet breakfast excellent sometimes tables sufficient people arrive time nice excellent furnished staff extremely heplful

Reviews.Title: “Warning-Do not stay in the Annex. Hotel is fine but in noisy San Marco location.”
Reviews.Author: Ozer
Reviews.Content: hotel fine stay dark annex service breakfast satisfactory hand location close hand makes noisy san marco location teeming tourists taking vaporetto quieter venice bit overwhelming

Reviews.Title: “Very comfortable room in a convenient location”
Reviews.Author: trobaba
Reviews.Content: hotel 4 minute walk san marco 6 minute walk rialto near popular sights location remember virtually neighborhood life commerce tourism anyway comfortably furnished clean modern bathroom helpful staff breakfast cold cuts croissants wireless internet free deal cut price january definitely feel lucked hotel partners sort nearby restaurant trattoria da called recommend eat dont restaurants vicinity run am wary serve geniune ambiance rialto bridge openair veggie fish market nighttime action wine bars cafe practically corner hotel serves wonderful heavenly coffee steep flight stairs leading hotel inconvenience stay consider aboveaverage value

Reviews.Title: “A free trip to Murano”
Reviews.Author: AussieSophia
Reviews.Content: pleasant stay breakfast organised served requested lady breakfast front desk helpful internet wifi access improved bit touch free day trip murano glass factory tour bonus clean quaint venetian decor luved location perfect 2 mins rialto bridge san marco sq

Reviews.Title: “LOVELY PLACE TO RELAX AND SLEEP AFTER ALONG DAY”
Reviews.Author: Nuha123
Reviews.Content: cosy hotel clean simple modern bath bright colored decorated stands 3 star gloomy hotels red dark wall paper location close san marco enjoy mornig simple breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel in excellent location”
Reviews.Author: MEMSouthWales
Reviews.Content: hotel clean bed sofa safe bathroom facilities excellent downside 103 reception sound carried easily noisy afternoon trying quiet hour heat else perfect
